DOC.brief_summary: Systematic study of the ultrasound infringements of tendons chest expanders of entheses the most involved in spondylarthropathies and small joints of hands and feet in expanding patients of psoriasis to estimate if there is an infra-clinical infringement of the psoriasic rheumatism .
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasound Study of Entheses and Small Joints of Hands and Feet in Patients With Atypical Form of Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Patients over 18 years Atypical psoriasis of the scalp and / or nails and / or psoriasis of folds Patient agreeing to participate in the study Psoriatic arthritis Rheumatic pain Arthritis Joint Trauma in hands, elbows knees, feet Current treatment with methotrexate, soriatane, cyclosporine, corticosteroids Current treatment with biological therapy (antiTNF, anti IL 1223) Previous history of rheumatic disease: inflammatory, microcrystalline, osteoarthritis Patients in physical or mental incapacity to agree
